Items.Title: Roll Call
Invocation
Items.AgendaNote:
Delivered by:  Rabbi Jonathan Glass, Civic Center Synagogue, 49 White Street, New York, NY  10013.

Motion to spread the invocation in full upon the record by COUNCIL MEMBER FREED.
Items.MinutesNote:
The Invocation was delivered by Rabbi Jonathan Glass, Civic Center Synagogue, 49 White Street, New York, N.Y.  10013.

Council Member Freed moved  that the Invocation be spread in full upon the Minutes and adopted.

Items.Title: Passed The Consent Agenda

Items.MinutesNote: The President Pro Tem (Council Member Spigner) put the question whether the Council would agree with and adopt such reports which were decided in the affirmative by the following vote:
The following files were removed from the General Order Calendar and voted separately: Int No. 741-A.  See files for individual votes.
At this point the Speaker (Council Member Vallone) made the following announcements

Whereupon on motion of the Acting Speaker (Council Member Pinkett), the Clerk of the Council adjourned the meeting In Memory of Judge and former Council Member Michael DeMarco; the Council adjourned to meet again on Tuesday, December 11, 2001.

VICTOR L. ROBLES, City Clerk
